information: We are a unique exporting company that provides a vast range of Spanish products to other European countries. We produce the pimientos padron (Padron Peppers) which are small green peppers which are sold in many cities in Spain and also abroad including London. We sell this item under our registered trademark DON LITO. In our portfolio we have a range of Spanish wines and Liqueurs. And he also have cheeses and Serrano and Iberico Hams. All our suppliers are selected because of their quality, unique taste and willingness to adapt to what the customer may need. Our concept is of expanding our portfolio so that we can provide you with all the products that you will need for your restaurant or delicatessen. What ever product that you may need, please do not hesitate to call and we will get it for you and it will be delivered to your premises.
address: Alfonso Senra nunmero 50 , Bajo Comercial, 15680 Ordes, La Coruna
